function.name: calculate_loan_emi
function.description: Calculate the monthly EMI for a loan.
function.long_description: Calculates the Equated Monthly Installment (EMI), total payment, and total interest for a loan based on principal amount, annual interest rate, and loan tenure.
example_user_queries: Calculate EMI for a loan of 10 lakhs at 8% for 20 years
What is the monthly EMI for a home loan?
How much EMI do I need to pay monthly?
Calculate interest and EMI for loan
What is the EMI for my loan?
